setup.description: Clone all of the raptorjs3 projects and link them together for raptorjs3 development

repos.description: Lists the Raptor repositories on GitHub

migrate javascript.description: Migrate JavaScript code by converting from AMD to CommonJS modules

normalize javascript.description: Regenerates all JavaScript code to ensure consistent code

migrate templates.description: Migrate Raptor Template files from XML to HTML

migrate components.description: Migrate UI components to the RaptorJS 3 style

migrate pages.description: Migrate UI page to the RaptorJS 3 style

upgrade all.description: Upgrade all RaptorJS modules referenced by other RaptorJS modules

upgrade modules.description: Upgrade modules in current project that are referenced in package.json

link modules.description: Link modules into current project that are referenced in package.json

commit all.description: Commit all changes in nested projects

pretty print templates.description: Pretty print all Raptor Template files

cleanup templates.description: Cleanup Raptor Templates by favoring directives as attributes

move dir.description: Move a directory and update all relative paths

migrate template includes.description: Migrate template includes to custom tags

upgrade 0.x versions.description: Bump up all major versons for modules that are 0.x

reset all.description: Runs git reset --hard HEAD for all modules (dangerous)
